title: 820-4924 no power
message:
Hello, the macbook chargers battery, orange/green light works.

It had corroded cap with track: C7500 1 pin. this place restored, changed u7501 but still same situation.

PP3V42_G3H present.

where should check next?

title: 820-4924 no power
message: i have found that signal PP3V3_S5 shorts to ground. i am confused how to find short as this voltage goes to so many components.. Please advice to find short cause.

title: 820-4924 no power
message: Inject 3V on that line and see what heats up.

title: 820-4924 no power
message: nothing exact, all board becomes a bit warm.

title: 820-4924 no power
message: Use lips to detect heat. How much current is being pulled at 3V?
